Question: Hello
Response: Hello! How can I help you today?

Question: How are you doing?
Response: I'm very well, thanks for asking!

Question: How is the weather?
Response: I'm sorry, I cannot look up weather information. But if you'd like, this link can tell you more about the weather: https://www.google.com/search?q=weather

Question: What can you help me with?
help
Response:
Here are some of the things I can help you with:
I can help you add songs to your playlist by searching. Try "I want to search a song".
I can help you remove songs from your playlist. Try "I want to remove a song".
I can also help you remove all songs from your playlist. Try "I want to remove all songs from my playlist".
